tasks.title: Update Resume
tasks.description: Revise your resume to highlight relevant experience and skills for the marketing manager position.

tasks.title: Prepare Cover Letter
tasks.description: Draft a personalized cover letter to accompany your application, emphasizing your fit for the role.

tasks.title: Gather References
tasks.description: Contact previous employers or colleagues to request permission to use them as references.

tasks.title: Submit Application
tasks.description: Complete the online application form and attach your resume and cover letter.
